benchmark_details.name: MidiCaps (A Large-Scale MIDI Dataset with Text Captions)
benchmark_details.overview: MidiCaps is the first openly available large-scale MIDI dataset with text captions, consisting of over 168,000 MIDI files paired with textual descriptions detailing musical content, thus facilitating multi-modal exploration and analysis.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enable research that combines LLMs with symbolic music by providing a large-scale curated MIDI dataset with captions.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Due to the symbolic nature of music, labeling files of various lengths is inherently difficult. Additionally, extracting features from synthesized audio files may impact accuracy.

data.size: 168,407 MIDI files with matching text captions
data.annotation: Generated using in-context learning with a Large Language Model (Claude 3), based on features extracted from MIDI files.

methodology.calculation: Captions were rated based on various matching criteria by participants in a listening study.
methodology.interpretation: Higher ratings indicate better matching of the captions to the MIDI audio and overall quality of the captions.
methodology.validation: Tested through subjective evaluation via a listening study.
